value: name=The Strategic Air and Space Museum

directions=Located between Omaha and Lincoln off of Interstate 80. Take exit #426 (same exit as Mahoney St. Park and the Simmons Wildlife Safari Park) and go west 1/2 mile. The museum is located on the right (north) side of the road.
price=$7 admission for non-member adults. $6 admission for seniors, active/retired military. $3 children ages 5-12. Under 5 are free.
hoursextra=closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year's, and Easter holidays

content=A large indoor aerospace museum which features various Cold War aircraft including the B-52 Stratofortress, B-36 Peacemaker, B-58 Hustler along with several other bomber, transport and fighter aircraft and missiles. Various touring exhibits are on display throughout the year usually dedicated toward aerospace. A snack bar and gift shop are available on premises.
